tool_description: An API shows real world Live Climate Change news around the world
name: Climate News LIVE 24/7
title: Climate News LIVE 24/7

api_list.name: Get all Climate Change NEWS
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all  news Related to Climate Change from all over the WORLD.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-news-live-24-7.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-news-live-24-7.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Individual News for Climate Change

api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-news-live-24-7.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-news-live-24-7.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
